scripts.sass: node-sass --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --linefeed crlf --output-style expanded --precision 10 Client/sass/styles.scss -o wwwroot/css/
scripts.sass-watch: node-sass -w -r --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --linefeed crlf --output-style expanded --precision 10 Client/sass/styles.scss -o wwwroot/css/
